83602.summary: Some customers in the Downtown area of New Westminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83602.title: Oct 5 - New Westminster (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

83600.summary: Some customers in the St. John's area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83600.title: Oct 5 - Winnipeg (St. John's) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
